extension.author: Fastw3b - We develop while you are thinking
extension.description:
FW Gallery Facebook Plugin

Compatibility: Joomla 3.0
License: GNU/GPL
Current version: 1.3.0

The plugin lets you import and export photos from/to your Facebook gallery in one click!

How to use

1. Go to FW Gallery - Plugins, find FW Gallery Facebook Plugin and enable it.
2. Click on 'Connect Facebook' button and log into your Facebook page.
3. Select gallery in Facebook galleriy/Local gallery drop-down lists.
4. Click 'Import'/'Export' button.

Importing/Exporting photos can take some time. Please be patient.

Tips

Be logged into your Facebook page before use of plugin.
Read documentation with screen shots that make every step clear.

In case you face some troubles using FW Gallery Facebook Plugin, please contact Fastw3b Support Team or write your questions on forum.
